name: Felipe
comment: While there is violence, love, and unwanted authority (hem hem, Dolores Umbridge), this book is AMAZING.

name: Maria
comment: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix is a complicated and compelling novel for mature kids, up to adults!

name: Ramiro
comment: There's love. Appropriate, but it's there. And the characters change. Sometimes in a good way, sometimes not.
